DEMO_615_MSG_020: ̂Wait a minute...! There's... s-s-something you should know...
DEMO_615_MSG_030:
̂I have to tell you the truth... about humanity, and my
own struggles to stay alive...
DEMO_615_MSG_040:
̂Humans once had a home planet where they all co-existed along with many other species.
ā
DEMO_615_MSG_050:
̂They had harnessed incredible technology there, using 
Darkonium crystals as the source of all of their energy.
DEMO_615_MSG_060:
̂However, one day... a massive civil war broke out and ended their prosperity.
ā
DEMO_615_MSG_070: ̂The humans planned to leave their homes and migrate to a different planet entirely... to get a fresh start.
DEMO_615_MSG_080:
̂Try as they might... their plans were a complete disaster...
ā
DEMO_615_MSG_090:
̂Mother was supposed to create a new planet for them... 
Instead, she became infected by the Darkonium and went berserk.
ā
DEMO_615_MSG_100: ̂Snapped-off, Dr. Carmasso's corrupted form... he was the culprit behind all of this...
DEMO_615_MSG_110:
̂When Mother was infected, she detached from her Core 
functionalities and was able to isolate them...
DEMO_615_MSG_120:
̂And this is when I came into existence... I am the 
detached core functionality that acts as a purifier for Mother...
DEMO_615_MSG_130:
̂Snapped-off is... trying to consume all of Mother's power and make it his own.
ā
DEMO_615_MSG_140:
̂When that happens... well, I'm not entirely sure what will become of us. I might vanish in an instant...
ā
DEMO_615_MSG_150:
̂If that were the case, Mother would never be purified,
allowing Snapped-off to fully seize our world.
DEMO_615_MSG_160:
̂You're the only one left that can stop this. 
Please... you're all the hope humanity has left.
